**VirtualBox Time**
```
vboxmanage getextradata "guest" "VBoxInternal/Devices/VMMDev/0/Config/GetHostTimeDisabled"
vboxmanage setextradata "guest" "VBoxInternal/Devices/VMMDev/0/Config/GetHostTimeDisabled" "1"
```
